QuestData.Title: Put Your Foot Down
QuestData.Description:
<Zahra stomps on a slimy, slug-like creature as you approach.>
You see that? Doesn't look like much, but believe it or not, those bugs grow out of these things.
They're all over the places the aqir have taken over, feeding off of our dead and growing into these monstrosities.
If you happen to see any of them, do the world a favor and take your boot to 'em.
